product_name: The North Face Storm Peak Triclimate 3-in-1 Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: Water-resistant, breathable and windproof, the Storm Peak Triclimate 3-in-1 shell jacket by The North Face offers unrestricted movement, warmth if you want it, and versatility in a convertible design. Three different ways to wear the system: wear shell jacket and zip-in liner jacket together for protection or wear either piece on its own as weather warrants. Apex ClimateBlock stretch shell fabric delivers excellent freedom of movement and is windproof, very water-resistant and highly breathable. Detachable hood is fully adjustable to ensure a weather-blocking, personalized fit. Adjustable powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Zippered handwarmer pockets; two chest pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket; internal media pocket. Shell jacket has adjustable cuffs and a drawcord hem to help seal out snow and cold air while retaining warmth. Zip in/out soft shell liner jacket with fleece lining features zippered handwarmer pockets. LIner jacket uses Apex Universal fabric that stretches for increased freedom of movement; fabric also breathes well and resists wind, rain and abrasion. Easy zip-in system mates the liner jacket and shell jacket together for added warmth allows easy reach-in access to the shell's interior features.
short_description: Water-resistant, breathable and windproof, the Storm Peak Triclimate 3-in-1 shell jacket by The North Face offers unrestricted movement, warmth if you want it, and versatility in a convertible design.
